channel.title: Container on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Container on Arrans github.io

item.title: sickcodes/Docker-OSX
item.description: Run macOS VM in a Docker! Run near native OSX-KVM in Docker! X11 Forwarding! CI/CD for OS X Security Research! Docker mac Containers.

item.title: Dacid99/Eonvelope
item.description: Preserve your emails with this open-source self-hostable email archive! This repository is just a mirror, please go to the gitlab repo at https://gitlab.com/Dacid99/eonvelope to contribute code.

item.title: TwiN/gatus
item.description: Automated developer-oriented status page with alerting and incident support

item.title: diegolnasc/kubernetes-best-practices
item.description: A cookbook with the best practices to working with kubernetes.

item.title: shubh-io/DockMate
item.description: Dockmate: The open-source Docker TUI & Podman manager for terminal productivity. A fast, lightweight alternative to lazydocker built in Go.

item.title: fat-tire/resolve
item.description: Container scripts to build and run DaVinci Resolve [Studio] for Linux using Docker or Podman
